languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс прикладывает одну из рук к груди — жест, изображающий оскорбленность, почти до смешного человеческий.{/n} "Какое яркое свидетельство вопиющей ограниченности, свойственной вашей расе. Я избавил ее от грубой поделки, которую вы считаете аугментом, и вернул интригующую особенность ее генетического кода! Что ж, я не буду тратить на нее свои лучшие материалы и верну ее убогий агрегат — немедленно!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Тервантьяс прикладывает одну из рук к груди — жест, тзображающий оскорбленностб, почти до смешного человеческий.{/n} "Это, Кламиа-Нальяс, прямое доказательство вашей ограниченности. Я избавил ее от грубой поделки, выдающей себя за имплант и вернул интригующую особенность ее генетического кода! Раз эта мон-кай пойдет с тобой арену, я не буду тратить на нее свои лучшие материалы и верну ее убогий агрегат".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс прикладывает одну из рук к груди — жест, изображающий оскорбленность, почти до смешного человеческий.{/n} "Какое яркое свидетельство вопиющей ограниченности, свойственной вашей расе. Я избавил ее от грубой поделки, которую вы считаете аугментом, и вернул интригующую особенность ее генетического кода! Что ж, я не буду тратить на нее свои лучшие материалы и верну ее убогий агрегат — немедленно!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest — a gesture not dissimilar to how a human would express their wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the flagrant shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of a crude handicraft that you call an augment, I restored the intriguing peculiarity of her genetic code! So be it. I won't squander my best materials on her. I will return her sordid contrivance without wasting another moment!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest — a gesture not dissimilar to how a human would express their wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the flagrant shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of a crude handicraft that you call an augment, I restored the intriguing peculiarity of her genetic code! So be it. I won't squander my best materials on her. I will return her sordid contrivance without wasting another moment!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias porte un de ses membres à sa poitrine, dans une imitation presque comique d'un humain blessé dans son orgueil.{/n} « Voilà encore une preuve de la superficialité de votre espèce. Après avoir retiré cet appareil cruel que vous qualifiez "d'augmentation", j'ai restauré un aspect intéressant de son code génétique ! Très bien. Je ne gaspillerai pas mes meilleurs matériaux sur elle. Je vais vous rendre son mécanisme immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias porte un de ses membres à sa poitrine, dans une imitation presque comique d'un humain blessé dans son orgueil.{/n} « Voilà encore une preuve de la superficialité de votre espèce. Après avoir retiré cet appareil cruel que vous qualifiez "d'augmentation", j'ai restauré un aspect intéressant de son code génétique ! Très bien. Je ne gaspillerai pas mes meilleurs matériaux sur elle. Je vais vous rendre son mécanisme immédiatement. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特凡提亚斯将一根附肢放在胸前，做了个近乎滑稽的手势，模仿人类自尊受伤的样子。{/n}“你的话恰恰证明了你的族人有多么肤浅！我帮助她摆脱了那件简陋的植入物，恢复了她原本基因密码中的某个有趣的特质！行吧，我以后再也不会把我最好的材料浪费在她身上了，我立刻就把她原来的机械装置弄回去。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}特凡提亚斯将一根附肢放在胸前，做了个近乎滑稽的手势，模仿人类自尊受伤的样子。{/n}“你的话恰恰证明了你的族人有多么肤浅！我帮助她摆脱了那件简陋的植入物，恢复了她原本基因密码中的某个有趣的特质！行吧，我以后再也不会把我最好的材料浪费在她身上了，我立刻就把她原来的机械装置弄回去。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias legt sich in einer fast schon komisch menschlichen Geste des verwundeten Stolzes eine Gliedmaße auf die Brust.{/n} "Welch atemberaubender Beweis der angeborenen Oberflächlichkeit Euresgleichen. Nachdem ich sie von diesem kruden Gerät befreit hatte, das ihr Augmentation nennt, habe ich eine faszinierende Eigenschaft ihres genetischen Codes wiederhergestellt! So sei es. Ich werde mein bestes Material nicht auf sie vergeuden. Ich gebe ihre Mechanismen unverzüglich zurück."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias legt sich in einer fast schon komisch menschlichen Geste des verwundeten Stolzes eine Gliedmaße auf die Brust.{/n} "Welch atemberaubender Beweis der angeborenen Oberflächlichkeit Euresgleichen. Nachdem ich sie von diesem kruden Gerät befreit hatte, das ihr Augmentation nennt, habe ich eine faszinierende Eigenschaft ihres genetischen Codes wiederhergestellt! So sei es. Ich werde mein bestes Material nicht auf sie vergeuden. Ich gebe ihre Mechanismen unverzüglich zurück."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias coloca un apéndice en su pecho con un gesto humano de orgullo herido que resulta ligeramente cómico.{/n} «Cómo se nota lo superficiales que son los de tu especie. Después de quitarte ese vulgar dispositivo que llamas aumento, ¡conseguí recuperar una característica interesante de su código genético! Pero está bien. No desperdiciaré mis materiales con ella. Devolveré el mecanismo de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias coloca un apéndice en su pecho con un gesto humano de orgullo herido que resulta ligeramente cómico.{/n} «Cómo se nota lo superficiales que son los de tu especie. Después de quitarte ese vulgar dispositivo que llamas aumento, ¡conseguí recuperar una característica interesante de su código genético! Pero está bien. No desperdiciaré mis materiales con ella. Devolveré el mecanismo de inmediato».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、傷ついたプライドを示そうと、滑稽とも言えるほど人間的なジェスチャーで胸に付属物を置く。{/n}「お前のような種族が生まれつき浅はかであることの証明だ。お前がオーグメントと呼ぶ 粗末な装置を取り除いた後、私は彼女の遺伝コードの興味深い特徴を復元した！まあいい。彼女のために最高の素材を無駄にするつもりはない。遅れることなく彼女のメカニズムを返してやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、傷ついたプライドを示そうと、滑稽とも言えるほど人間的なジェスチャーで胸に付属物を置く。{/n}「お前のような種族が生まれつき浅はかであることの証明だ。お前がオーグメントと呼ぶ 粗末な装置を取り除いた後、私は彼女の遺伝コードの興味深い特徴を復元した！まあいい。彼女のために最高の素材を無駄にするつもりはない。遅れることなく彼女のメカニズムを返してやろう」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias; uzuvlarından birini göğsüne koyuyor, komik sayılabilecek bir gururu incinmiş insan taklidi yapıyor.{/n} "Türünün doğuştan sahip olduğu sığlığın ne kadar da net bir göstergesi. Onu ogment dediğin o ilkel cihazdan kurtardıktan sonra genetik kodundaki enteresan bir niteliği yeniledim! Öyle olsun. Onun için elimdeki en iyi materyalleri harcamayacağım. Mekanizmasını hemen iade edeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias places an appendage on his chest in an almost comically human gesture of wounded pride.{/n} "What striking proof of the innate shallowness of your kind. After ridding her of that crude device you refer to as an augment, I restored an intriguing feature of her genetic code! So be it. I will not squander my best materials on her. I will return her mechanism without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias, uzuvlarından birini göğsüne koyarak, komik sayılabilecek bir gururu incinmiş insan taklidi yapıyor.{/n} "Türünün doğuştan sahip olduğu sığlığın ne kadar da net bir göstergesi. Onu sizin ogment dediğiniz o ilkel cihazdan kurtardıktan sonra genetik kodundaki enteresan bir niteliği yeniledim! Öyle olsun. Onun için elimdeki en iyi materyalleri harcamayacağım. Mekanizmasını hemen iade edeceğim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
